name: Chiefboz Scripts
short_description:
ATTENTION: A bug has been found that will affect your scripting. Please do not download until this message is removed.

Chiefboz Scripts is a single file with many functions that allow anyone to make hand-coded buildings for Skyscraper quickly and easily.

Download Skyscraper at www.skyscrapersim.com.
